longBusinessSummary.0: Dhani Services Limited offers digital healthcare and digital transactional finance through its Dhani app in India. The company provides personal loans, and business installment loans. Its e-pharmacy sells pharmaceutical products. It also offers subscriptions for product offerings for healthcare and transaction finance services. In addition, the company offers card enabled prepaid payment program management and remittance services. Further, it engages in the provision of stock and commodity broking services; business of cross selling of real estate; and asset reconstruction business of stressed assets. The company was formerly known as Indiabulls Ventures Limited and changed its name to Dhani Services Limited in October 2020. Dhani Services Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Mumbai, India.
